mapper.sql: WITH PAGE_INFO AS ( SELECT #{PAGE_SIZE} PAGE_SIZE , #{PAGE_NUM} PAGE_NUM ) , LST AS ( SELECT * , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PAGE_KEY) RNUM FROM (
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MOB_RSC_FILE where SVC_ID = #{SVC_ID} and REG_DTTM != MOD_DTTM order by rsc_id DESC

SELECT *
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RSC_ID DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RSC_ID ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_IDX DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_IDX ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_NM DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_NM ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_EXT DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_EXT ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_SIZE DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_SIZE ASC) PAGE_KEY
FROM TB_MOB_RSC_FILE
where SVC_ID = #{SVC_ID}

SELECT *
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PLAT_IDX DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BIN_VER DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RSC_ID DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_NM DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_VER DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_NM DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REG_DTTM DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MOD_DTTM DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_TP DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USE_YN DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_EXT DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_SIZE DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(DPLY_IDX DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY PLAT_IDX ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BIN_VER ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY RSC_ID ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_NM ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_VER ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_NM ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REG_DTTM ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MOD_DTTM ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_TP ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USE_YN ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_EXT ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_SIZE ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DPLY_IDX ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(RSC_FILE_IDX ASC) PAGE_KEY
FROM TB_MOB_RSC_FILE where SVC_ID = #{SVC_ID} AND STS_CD = #{STS_CD}

SELECT S1.SVC_ID, S1.SVC_NM, S1.APP_ID FROM TB_SVC S1 ,TB_SVC_AUTH S2,TB_MOB_SVC S3 WHERE S1.SVC_ID = S2.SVC_ID AND S1.SVC_ID = S3.SVC_ID AND ISNULL(S3.USE_YN ,'N') = 'Y' AND S2.AUTH_GRP_ID IN( SELECT AUTH_GRP_ID FROM TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP WHERE USER_ID = #{S_ID_USER} )
SELECT APP_ID FROM TB_SVC WHERE SVC_ID = #{SVC_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MOB_DPLY (DPLY_NM, DPLY_VER, DPLY_DESC, DPLY_TP, USE_YN, SVC_ID, DPLY_FULL_YN, REF_VER, REG_DTTM,REG_ID) VALUES(#{DPLY_NM}, #{DPLY_VER}, #{DPLY_DESC}, #{DPLY_TP}, #{USE_YN}, #{SVC_ID}, #{DPLY_FULL_YN}, #{REF_VER}, GETDATE() , #{REG_ID})

INSERT INTO TB_FILE_ATTACH (FILE_ID, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, FILE_TYPE, URL_CHILD_PATH, OBJ_CODE, OBJ_ID, REG_DATE, MD5) VALUES(#{FILE_ID}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_EXT}, #{FILE_SIZE}, #{FILE_TYPE}, #{URL_CHILD_PATH}, #{OBJ_CODE}, #{OBJ_ID}, GETDATE(), #{MD5})

INSERT INTO TB_MOB_DPLY_DTL (DPLY_IDX, FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE, DEL_YN, STS_CD, REG_DTTM, SVC_ID, RSC_ID) SELECT #{DPLY_IDX}, #{FILE_NM}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{FILE_SIZE}, #{DEL_YN}, #{STS_CD}, GETDATE(), #{SVC_ID} , (select RSC_ID FROM tb_mob_rsc_file where REPLACE(file_path,'\','/') like '%' + #{FILE_PATH} + '%' and sts_cd='W' and svc_id = #{SVC_ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MOB_RSC_FILE SET STS_CD = 'C' , MOD_DTTM = GETDATE() WHERE SVC_ID = #{SVC_ID}
mapper.select:
SELECT S1.DPLY_IDX, S1.DPLY_NM, S1.DPLY_VER, S1.REG_DTTM, S1.DPLY_DESC, S1.DPLY_TP, S1.USE_YN, S1.SVC_ID, S1.DPLY_FULL_YN,S1.REF_VER, S3.FILE_IDX,S3.FILE_ID, S3.FILE_PATH, S3.FILE_NAME, S3.FILE_SIZE, (SELECT SVC_NM FROM TB_SVC WHERE SVC_ID = S1.SVC_ID) AS SVC_NM
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_IDX DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_IDX ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_VER DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_VER ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_NM DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_NM ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.REG_DTTM DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.REG_DTTM ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_TP DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.DPLY_TP ASC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.USE_YN DESC) PAGE_KEY
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY S1.USE_YN ASC) PAGE_KEY
FROM TB_MOB_DPLY S1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT A.SVC_ID FROM TB_SVC_AUTH A , TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP B , TB_MOB_SVC C WHERE A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID AND B.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} AND A.SVC_ID = C.SVC_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.SVC_ID = #{SVC_ID}
) S2 ON S1.SVC_ID = S2.SVC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE_ATTACH S3 ON S1.DPLY_IDX = S3.OBJ_ID
SELECT DPLY_DTL_IDX,FILE_NM,FILE_PATH,FILE_SIZE,DEL_YN,STS_CD,REG_DTTM,DPLY_IDX,SVC_ID,RSC_ID , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FILE_NM) PAGE_KEY FROM TB_MOB_DPLY_DTL WHERE DPLY_IDX = #{DPLY_IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MOB_DPLY SET REG_DTTM = GETDATE() , DPLY_TP= #{DPLY_TP} , USE_YN = #{USE_YN} , DPLY_DESC = #{DPLY_DESC} WHERE DPLY_IDX = #{DPLY_IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT S1.DPLY_IDX, S3.FILE_PATH FROM TB_MOB_DPLY S1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FILE_ATTACH S3 ON S1.DPLY_IDX=S3.OBJ_ID WHERE S1.SVC_ID=#{SVC_ID} AND S1.DPLY_TP = #{DPLY_TP} AND S1.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY S1.DPLY_VER ASC
SELECT B.FILE_PATH, B.FILE_SIZE, B.FILE_NM AS FILE_NAME, B.SVC_ID FROM TB_MOB_DPLY A, TB_MOB_DPLY_DTL B WHERE A.DPLY_IDX=B.DPLY_IDX AND A.SVC_ID=#{SVC_ID} AND A.USE_YN='Y' AND B.DEL_YN='N'
